ocean.question: I am big and blue, fish swim in me. What am I?
I am a fish with bright colors and a symbiotic relationship with sea anemones. What am I?
I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze with my arms.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I am very big and sing songs under the water. What am I?
I have a long body and sharp teeth. I swim very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🌊 Some people are scared of me.

ocean.question: I am small and round, and I live inside a shell at the bottom of the ocean. Sometimes I have a shiny pearl inside. What am I?
I am a flat fish that can sometimes hide in the sand to look like the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ Both my eyes are on one side.
🪨 I can blend in with the sand.

ocean.question: I am a long, skinny fish that looks like a snake, and I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a fish, but I look like a reptile.

ocean.question: I am a tiny creature that floats in the ocean and is eaten by many other animals. What am I?

weather.question: I fall from the sky. You need an umbrella to stay dry. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You don't want me on your head without protection!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when you look at me.

weather.question: I am white and cold. I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I'm around.

weather.question: I blow through the trees. Sometimes I am gentle, sometimes I am strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can be a gentle breeze or a powerful force.

weather.question: I am grey and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🐑 I can look like a sheep.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of rain and wind. Be careful! What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need a very strong umbrella.
🏠 Stay inside when I am here!

weather.question: I am ice that falls from the sky. I can be small or big. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard and can hurt.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I appear when the sun comes out after a storm.
💧 I am made of light and water.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ Stay away from trees when I am around!

weather.question: I am a loud noise that follows a flash of light during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can hear me from far away.
